title: Ancient Mysteries of the Bible
description: The greatest mysteries of the Holy Bible are explored in this riveting book by Braeden Templeton. Is Noah's Ark sitting on a mountaintop in current day Turkey? Did the Garden of Eden truly exist on this earth? Who wrote the Dead Sea Scrolls? Is the Holy Grail being purposefully hidden in Jerusalem? Where did the lost tribes of Israel go? Is the Ark of the Covenant in the hands of men seeking world domination from its mystical powers? What happened to the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah? All of these subjects are pondered inside "Ancient Mysteries of the Bible".
author: Braeden Templeton
